attributes.action: Set tariffs on China over the treatment of ethnic minorities.
attributes.additional_details: The nation is undergoing the forced removal of children from their families to purpose built boarding schools, to cleanse these children off their lineage. Prosecuted individuals are having their organs harvested as part of this process of mass genocide and ethnic cleansing. Forced marriages between religions by the state have been documented. Individuals are being made to denounce their religions.  Forced consumption of alcohol and pork. Countless more human right breaches can be listed
attributes.background:
Reports have suggested that the Chinese government has been placing ethnic minorities and Muslims in what is dubbed re-education camps, truly existing as modern concentration camps.

The aim of this is to assert pressure on the Chinese state for their actions.
